screen.title: Set-up on Arrival
screen.text: Set up your basic cones and signs at the front and rear of the vehicle as required

screen.title: Set-up on Arrival
screen.text: Capture the set-up in front of, and behind, the vehicle. At least two photos are required.

screen.title: Customer
screen.text: Is the customer present?

screen.title: Customer
screen.text: Is it possible to continue working?

screen.title: Calling Card
screen.text: Capture the completed calling card

screen.title: Overhead Cables
screen.text: Are there any overhead cables at this location that present a risk?

click.text: Ensure that your vehicle is a safe height to continue. If in doubt contact your Field Manager.

screen.title: Safe System of Work
screen.text: Do you have the 'Safe System of Work' pack that covers this job type?

screen.title: Weather
screen.text: Is the weather suitable to commence work?

screen.title: Other Contractors
screen.text: Are there any other contractors working in the vicinity?

click.text: Make contact and discuss work co-ordination

screen.title: Other Contractors
screen.text: Following discussion with contractors, is it safe to continue work?

screen.title: Suitable Training
screen.text: Are you and your fellow team members suitably trained and competent to complete the work required?

screen.title: PPE
screen.text: Do you have correct and suitable PPE to carry out this work?

screen.title: Equipment
screen.text: Do you the have correct equipment to carry out the works?

screen.title: First Aid Kit
screen.text: Do you have a full and in-date first aid kit and eye wash?

click.text: Contact your Field Manager and arrange to collect what you need ASAP.

screen.title: Equipment
screen.text: Have you completed your daily equipment checks?

click.text: Complete your equipment checks - It could save your life!

screen.title: Equipment
screen.text: Having completed your equipment checks, is it safe to continue?

screen.title: Footpaths
screen.text: Will your work involve using or obstructing the footpath?

screen.title: Footpaths
screen.text: Capture the protection measures in place on/around footpaths

screen.title: Noise
screen.text: Will your equipment create a noise hazard?

screen.title: Noise
screen.text: Can you safely control the risk to yourself and others?

screen.title: Spillage Procedure
screen.text: Do you have a spill kit and knowledge of the spillage procedure?

click.text: Contact your Field Manager and arrange to collect what you need ASAP.

screen.title: Fuels & Substances
screen.text: Are all fuels and substances on your vehicle correctly labelled and do you have COSHH data sheets for all substances?

screen.title: Aeration Equipment
screen.text: Do you require aeration equipment for this job?

click.text: Caution - lifejacket required. Do not start work without one.

screen.title: Standpipe
screen.text: Do you have a suitable and working standpipe?

screen.title: Standpipe
screen.text: Can you continue working safely?

screen.title: Standpipe
screen.text: Optional: Capture an image of the standpipe if required

screen.title: Location Awareness
screen.text: Is there anything at this location which may harm you or another person?

screen.title: Location Awareness
screen.text: Can you suitably control the risk at this location?

screen.title: Location Awareness
screen.text: Capture an image or add a description of how you will control the risk at this location?

screen.title: Confirmation
screen.text: I confirm that the hazards at this location can be suitably controlled and it is safe to continue work. If anything at this location changes I will stop work and re-assess.
Start Work - remember safe manual handling. 'Use the big engines!'

screen.title: Safe Zone
screen.text: Capture the safe zone
